0.text: Innate - The Ball: Orianna is accompanied by The Ball, which she commands with her abilities. The Ball incurs a  0.15-second global cooldown on all abilities between casts. Additionally, The Ball attaches to Orianna if she is near it, and snaps back to her if she moves too far away from it, which incurs a  0.5-second global cooldown on all abilities.

1.text:
Innate: Orianna's basic attacks generate a stack of Clockwork Winding for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent attacks and stacks up to 2 times. All stacks are lost when attacking a new enemy.
Clockwork Winding: Orianna's basic attacks deal 10 − 50 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage  on-hit, increased by「 20% 」「 2 − 10 (based on level) (+ 3% AP) 」per stack, up to 14 − 70 (based on level) (+ 21% AP) total bonus magic damage.

2.text: See Pets for more details about The Ball.

0.text: Active: Orianna commands  The Ball to fly to the target location and remain there, dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through and nearby enemies upon arrival, reduced to 100% − 40% (based on enemies hit).
Active: Orianna commands  The Ball to emit an electric pulse that deals magic damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: The pulse leaves behind an electric field that last 3 seconds, granting  bonus movement speed to Orianna and her allies when they step within. Enemies that step within would be  slowed for the same amount, decaying over 2 seconds after leaving the field.

0.text: Passive:  The Ball grants  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance to the unit it is attached to.

1.text: Active: Orianna commands The Ball to fly to herself or the target allied  champion and attach itself to the target, dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through and  shielding the target for 2.5 seconds upon arrival.

0.text: Active: Orianna commands  The Ball to unleash a shockwave that deals magic damage to nearby enemies,  stunning them for 0.75 seconds, and  pulling them 325 − 700 (based on proximity to ball) inward, though not through terrain.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • dring

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+200 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – STASIS: Put yourself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you  untargetable and  invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
